id-57178.title: Painter Artist
id-57178.post-content:
Are you an artist, abstract painter, or an art educator? Want to showcase your work to the world? Import our Painter Artist template and launch your website quickly and easily.

The creatively designed template complements your work and does justice while showcasing your portfolio. Promote your best work, include details of upcoming exhibitions, sell your paintings online, include courses on painting, and do a lot more on your website.

Key features of the Painter Artist template

  • Creatively designed website template, ideal for artists and art lovers
  • From showcasing your artwork to upcoming exhibitions, the template has it all covered
  • Well integrated with WooCommerce allowing you to sell your artwork online
  • Create and manage courses on painting as well
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-57178.post-excerpt: Aesthetically pleasing website design that’s perfect for artists and art lovers

id-54398.title: Digital Agency
id-54398.post-content:
You’ll probably agree that prospective clients would like to see your portfolio of work before engaging with you. In addition to having a portfolio to showcase, having a professionally designed agency website would surely help close the deal. 

Our Digital Agency template does that for you. The beautifully designed template helps you showcase your expertise, promote your services, introduce the team members, and even display testimonials from your happy clients.

Key features of the Digital Agency template

  • Professionally designed digital agency template to showcase your expertise
  • Template includes done-for-pages, such as an about us, services, and a fully functional contact page
  • Customize the website to match your branding, using the global color palette and typography
  • Fully functional newsletter subscription form
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-54398.post-excerpt: Build an agency website using our professionally designed Digital Agency template

id-57122.title: Business Consultancy Firm
id-57122.post-content:
If you’re an independent business consultant or a consultancy firm, having a professional-looking website gives you the much-needed edge over your competitors. Whether consultancy in business, financial, or even sales and marketing, our Business Consultancy Firm web template gives you that professional edge.

The template has impressive background effects and allows you to share case studies, list your services, and reviews from happy clients.

Key features of the Business Consultancy Firm template

  • Professionally designed consultancy firm template that comes with impressive background effects
  • The package includes templates for every service that you may offer, such as business consultancy, financial consultancy, and HR consultancy, among others
  • The about us page contains details of the team members and career opportunities with the firm
  • A ‘book a free consulting call’ call to action button is integrated into the top menu
  • Fully responsive and customizable business consultancy firm template
id-57122.post-excerpt: The perfect template to build a professional-looking business consultancy firm website

id-46177.title: Mountain
id-46177.post-content:
Whether you’re an individual or a business, this fast, fully responsive multipurpose template, gives you all the tools you need to build a website. It provides the foundation for an amazing website. All it needs is your creativity.

Offer your services on the homepage and in the provided service page template. The template comes with a significant hero image that includes CTA buttons. Additionally, share those breathtaking mountain photos to entice your audience.

Key features of the Mountain template

  • Simple and clean design, ideal for building a multipurpose website
  • Dedicated section to offer your services on the homepage
  • Share breathtaking photos
  • Call to action button integrated into the top menu
  • Compatible with all popular page builders
id-46177.post-excerpt: A fantastic multipurpose website template with modern typography and engaging design

id-34012.title: Pet Care
id-34012.post-content:
Want more takers for your pet care services? Promote your services online by building an attractive website using the Pet Care template. It comes with everything you need to take your business online and engage with prospective pet lovers.

The homepage is designed to promote your best three services right up front. Scroll down, and you get to showcase all your services, include reviews of happy pet lovers, and book a free consultation call.

Key features of the Pet Care template

  • Creatively designed pet care website template
  • Impressive mouseover effects on the homepage images
  • Done-for-you templates for about us, services, reviews, and contact page
  • The about us page includes details of the team behind the pet care service
  • SEO-friendly and page builder ready
id-34012.post-excerpt: A perfect website template to connect with pet lovers and offer your pet care services

id-55687.title: Home Stay
id-55687.post-content:
Want your homestay to run on 100% occupancy? You can promote your homestay and accept online reservations from a global audience by having an online presence. The elegantly designed Home Stay web template helps you launch your website quickly.

The design transports you to the serenity and tranquility of living in the countryside. The template has everything you need to build an informative and engaging website, from showcasing the rooms to the property facilities.

Key features of the Home Stay template

  • Simple and clean design that gives a rustic and countryside look and feel
  • Significant hero image perfect for promoting the homestay
  • The homepage features the amenities and customer reviews
  • Google map is integrated to help prospective customers locate the property
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-55687.post-excerpt: A simple and clean website design that’s perfect for a homestay accommodation website

id-51295.title: Business Coaching & Consulting
id-51295.post-content:
If you are an independent consultant offering all kinds of business coaching and consulting services, the Business Coaching & Consulting template is precisely what you need to build a professional-looking website.

The template revolves around you and your services. Promote yourself on the significant hero image while including a CTA button to connect with you. Showcase the various coaching and consulting services you offer and the reviews of your happy clients. It’s all here!

Key features of the Business Coaching & Consulting template

  • Clean and professional-looking website template, perfect for a coaching and consulting business
  • Well-placed CTA buttons encouraging prospective clients to connect with you
  • Each of the template pages has been well thought out and designed
  • The contact page has Google maps integrated and a fully functional form
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-51295.post-excerpt: Professional website templates tailor-made to build a coaching and consulting business

id-57014.title: Food & Drinks Blogger
id-57014.post-content:
Are you a food and drinks blogger? Want to become an influencer or an authority in your niche? Start by building your online presence. Import our Food & Drinks Blogger template and launch your blog quickly and easily.

The template uses pastel colors that are just perfect for an engaging blog and allows you to share reviews of exotic food and drinks, restaurants, street food places, and recipes on your blog.

Key features of the Food & Drinks Blogger template

  • Appealing design that’s sure to enhance user engagement
  • Build an email list by using the well-integrated newsletter subscription form placed in the hero section of your homepage
  • Publish blogs and reviews on restaurants, recipes, food, drinks, and more
  • Upload video reviews as well on your food and drinks blog
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-57014.post-excerpt: Appealing website design, ideal for food and drinks bloggers and influencers

id-51472.title: Bestselling Author
id-51472.post-content:
As an author, you’ll surely want your publication to be the next bestseller. Want to promote your books online? Build a stylish and creative website using the Bestselling Author template and launch your website right away.

The template is smartly designed and well planned, from promoting your latest book upfront to showcasing all your work on the homepage. The readymade templates include pages like about, books, and contact.

Key features of the Bestselling Author template

  • Build your website using the stylish Bestselling Author template
  • Promote your latest book on the homepage, above the fold
  • The template is WooCommerce ready and allows you to sell your books online
  • A fully functional contact form for readers to connect with you
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-51472.post-excerpt: Stylish website template for authors to promote and sell their publications
